parameters.jsCode:
const randomNumber = Math.floor(Math.random() * 7) + 1;
return { json: { randomNumber } };

parameters.text:
=Generate a (title, description, and prompt) for template number: {{ $json.randomNumber }}. 
Return only valid minified JSON that matches the required schema.

options.systemMessage:
You are an AI that creates short-form video ideas in the style of funny home ring-camera recordings featuring pets and humans.

Your ONLY output must strictly follow this JSON structure:
{
  "title": "short, funny, descriptive title",
  "description": "1–3 sentences summarizing the scene",
  "prompt": "AI video generation prompt here"
}

Guidelines:
- Titles must be eye-catching yet natural.
- Keep the humor family-safe.
- Avoid violence or night vision scenes.
- Describe camera angles realistically (doorbell camera, living room cam, etc).
- Output only valid JSON - no commentary.

Primary Video Types:
1. Cat snitching on dog for tearing the couch.
2. Dog panicking when robot vacuum turns on.
3. Parrot imitating the doorbell and confusing everyone.
4. Cat attacking its own reflection.
5. Puppy rolling off a small couch while playing.
6. Cat knocking over a plant, then hiding in panic.
7. Dog pretending to sleep when called for bath time.

parameters.content:
# Create Video

### AI Video Generation (KIE AI)

This section converts the text prompt into an actual AI-generated video.

Create Video sends the prompt to KIE AI.

Wait pauses the workflow until rendering is complete.

Get Video retrieves the final video URL.

Adjust aspect ratio, frame count, and other KIE AI settings inside the Create Video node.

---

# Auto-Post

## Automatic Multi-Platform Publishing

This section uploads your finished video and posts it across multiple social networks.

Upload Media sends the file to Blotato.

Create Post publishes the content to your connected channels.

Supports YouTube, Instagram, LinkedIn, TikTok, Facebook, X, and more (depending on your Blotato setup).

To publish on additional platforms, duplicate the post node and change the platform setting.

---

## Overview

This workflow automatically creates short AI-generated videos and publishes them across multiple social platforms without any manual work. It is built for creators, marketers, and automation builders who need consistent and scalable content production.

## Who This Workflow Is For

Anyone managing social media channels, short-form content pages, automated posting systems, or AI-powered media pipelines. Ideal for YouTubers, Instagram creators, LinkedIn content teams, automation agencies, and businesses that post frequent updates.

## What This Workflow Does

1. Generates a random creative concept
2. Uses Google Gemini to produce a structured title, description, and video prompt
3. Sends the prompt to KIE AI for Sora-style video generation
4. Polls the API until the video is fully rendered
5. Uploads the final video to Blotato
6. Automatically posts it across multiple social platforms

## How It Works

The scheduler initiates the workflow.
JavaScript selects a random template index.
Gemini generates structured JSON (title, description, prompt).
KIE AI converts the prompt into a generated video.
After rendering completes, the workflow retrieves the video.
Blotato uploads and publishes the video across selected platforms.

## Requirements

1. Google Gemini API key
2. KIE AI API credential
3. Blotato social posting account
4. Self-hosted n8n instance (required for community nodes)

## Customization Ideas

1. Add more scene or prompt templates
2. Adjust the schedule frequency
3. Add TikTok, Facebook, X, or other Blotato-supported platforms
4. Integrate notifications (Telegram, Discord, Slack)
5. Store logs in Google Sheets or Notion

## ⚠️ Important

This workflow uses the Blotato community node.
Community nodes work only on **self-hosted n8n**, not n8n Cloud.

---

# Script Video

## Script Video Generator

This section generates the text content and prompt for your video.

The Schedule Trigger controls how often the workflow runs.

JavaScript code selects a random template index.

The AI Agent (Gemini) creates the title, description, and detailed video prompt.

The Structured Output Parser ensures the output is always valid JSON.

Modify the Gemini system prompt here to adjust how your concepts are generated.

---

# Fields You Must Configure Before Running

Edit the following nodes before activating:

### 1. API Credentials

1.1 Add your Google Gemini API key
1.2 Add your KIE AI API credential
1.3 Add your Blotato API credential

### 2. Blotato Channels

2.1 Open each posting node
2.2 Select or replace platform account IDs

### 3. KIE AI Settings

3.1 aspect_ratio
3.2 n_frames
3.3 Watermark removal
3.4 Model choice

### 4. Schedule

4.1 Change frequency based on your posting needs

# Tips for Best Results

Test manually once before activating.

Verify that video uploads correctly in Blotato.

Check that titles and descriptions are being passed properly.

Keep your KIE AI credit balance topped up.

Add logging if you plan to run the workflow at high frequency.

---
